title: Google I/O 2023: Google Adds Generative AI to Search
description: Challenged by ChatGPT, the king of search launches a feature that can answer queries with text summarizing information found online.

title: Twitter’s Purge of Old Accounts Will Be Pure Chaos
description: Elon Musk’s plan to reclaim accounts—including those of dead celebrities or failed brands—could start a free-for-all with dangerous and upsetting consequences.

title: This European Satellite Giant Is Coming for Starlink
description: To compete with American rivals, Eutelsat’s Eva Berneke first has to navigate Russia’s war in Ukraine, Brexit politics, and jamming attacks by Iran.
